clusterArn.description: ARN of the cluster in which this routing control will reside.

controlPanelArn.description: ARN of the control panel in which this routing control will reside.

name.description:
The name describing the routing control.

The following arguments are optional:

status.description: Status of routing control. `PENDING` when it is being created/updated, `PENDING_DELETION` when it is being deleted, and `DEPLOYED` otherwise.

controlPanelArn.description: ARN of the control panel in which this routing control will reside.

name.description:
The name describing the routing control.

The following arguments are optional:

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering RoutingControl resources.
